description.@en: You have pains in your stomach that make it difficult to keep down ‘rich’ food. This also means other kinds of substances can have a poor effect on your health, and keep you confined to the water closet.

effect.@en: After taking a dose of Laudanum, a Delirient or consuming a substance the GM sees as being hard on your stomach, you cannot recover to Unhindered on the Peril Condition Track (only to Imperiled) for the next 24-hours.
